Portal is a sum of contradictions: it’s an FPS game with no weapons, no human characters, no complex scenery, but one that uses a simple and incredibly fun concept, with a well thought-of story and accessible to people of all ages.

Portal is a magnificent puzzle game. The titillating wrongness of every solution and the wonky thinking required to get there make you feel like a space-folding genius, and yet you'll almost never get stuck.

久仰大名
独立四小时通关之后，心情久久不能平静
作为英雄联盟玩家，折返跃迁是我的第一感受
势能转换定律诚不欺我
想起在跳台那关，即使已经到达电梯门口
我仍要尝试从最高处落到最低的踏板，再次感受起飞的快乐
不难的关卡，却给了玩家无穷无尽想象的空间
或许这就是好游戏的魅力所在吧
努力玩到最后，你一定不会后悔！

I'm not even angry.
让憎恨随风。
I'm being so sincere right now.
我心境明澄。
Even though you broke my heart.
即使揉碎我的心。
And killed me.
让我不得生。
And tore me to pieces.
将我碾为灰尘。
And threw every piece into a fire.
抑或将我推入火炕。
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
我燃烧之时，略为伤神，因为我曾是为你喝彩的人。

—《Still Alive》

Oyun Kısaca

Portal’da oyuncu Chell isimli bir karakteri yöneterek, karşılaştığı bulmacaları Portal silahından yararlanarak geçmek zorundadır. Bu silah, oyuncunun içinden geçerek diğer tarafa ulaşabileceği sadece iki geçit açabilme özelliğini içermektedir. Bunun yardımı ile oyuncu, açtığı birinci geçidin içinden geçerek ikincinin içinden çıkabilmektedir. Ayrıca aygıt ile çevrede genel olarak bulmacaların çözümü için bulunan nesneler de taşınabilmektedir.

Fun puzzle game, the tagline is "Thinking with Portals" for a reason. Story line is also pretty good, and ties into the halflife universe if you listen to some of the things said and written in this game and the 2nd.

Also, rather blatant tie in by half life 2, which explicitly shows that Apature is a thing in universe.

It is a short game, less than 5 hours if you do your best with the story, but the extra maps and challenges roughly double that.

For a game in 2007, Portal's lonely and off-putting feeling still holds up today. You can read all the lore you want, but it still gets to you, would recommend, kinda.
